DOC.brief_summary: This Phase 2 , double-blind , multicenter , randomize , placebo-controlled trial evaluate efficacy safety Sprifermin ( AS902330 ) ( recombinant human fibroblast growth factor-18 [ rhFGF-18 ] ) adjunct treatment subject follow microfracture ( MFx ) surgery cartilage injury knee . Primary Objectives - To evaluate effect Sprifermin ( AS902330 ) intra-articular knee injection adjunct microfracture ( MFx ) surgery composition refill cartilage target knee , measure gadolinium-enhanced magnetic resonance imaging ( MRI ) cartilage ( dGEMRIC ) time constant 1 ( T1 ) relaxation time 6 month MFx surgery - To evaluate safety profile Sprifermin ( AS902330 ) administer intra-articular knee adjunct MFx surgery subject cartilage injury knee Secondary Objectives - To support efficacy safety Sprifermin ( AS902330 ) adjunct MFx cartilage injury repair symptomatic outcome quantitative MRI measurement
DOC.brief_title: A Multicenter Trial Sprifermin ( AS902330 Recombinant Human Fibroblast Growth Factor-18 ) Placebo After Microfracture Surgery Cartilage Injury Knee
